name: The Daily Dark
description:
Welcome to the world of UNDERCOVER JOURNALISM. Get In, Take some pictures, Get Out (Hopefully). It sounds very simple but trust me, it isn't. as you sneak in you will understand that it takes some skills to "shock" your way past all the lies, Do You Have What It Takes?
If you respond positively, this is the job for you, we do pay much.

Metal Gear Solid meets Anchor Man in this stealth action shooter.

Credits:
- RandomnessThats aka Mark Mueller

- AlbertoQP

- Peter Griffin

- Emre Gözüm

- Guy Gershon

- moist_coffee
